text: Szadkowski (feminine: Szadkowska) is a Polish locational surname and means a person from a place in Poland called Szadek, Szadki or Szadkowice.Dictionary of American Family Names. "Szatkowski Family History", Oxford University Press, 2013. Retrieved on 16 January 2016. A variant: Szatkowski. The surname may refer to: * (1920-1990), Polish artist, sculptor, and educator *Zuzanna Szadkowski (born 1978), American actress * (1912-1995), Polish emigre politician, officer of the Polish Armed Forces in the West, social and scout activist ==References== Category:Polish-language surnames
title: Szadkowski
